assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: P.A. Nova S.A. engages in the construction business in Poland. It operates as a general contractor for commercial and residential facilities, office buildings, public utility facilities, and industrial halls. The company also provides architectural design services for commercial facilities comprising commercial parks, shopping centers, commercial pavilions, workshops, salons and service points, and gas stations; residential objects, including housing estates, single-family housing estates, multi-family buildings, apartment buildings, and hotels; office buildings, office and service complexes, and training and conference centers; public utility facilities, such as administrative, cultural, sports, and infrastructural buildings; production and warehouse halls; hotels and guest houses; revitalization of buildings; spatial planning services; small architecture consists of viewing platforms, fountains, lighting, shelters, benches and other seats, garden architecture, and other utility and construction facilities; and town planning services. In addition, it provides property development and management services; integrates CAD/PDM/PLM/MES/ERP systems; advisory and support services for mechanical, architectural, and infrastructure industries; and 3D scanning and printing, and training services. P.A. Nova S.A. was founded in 1987 and is based in Gliwice, Poland.

companyOfficers.name: Ms. Agnieszka  Bobkowska
companyOfficers.title: Sec. of the Supervisory Board & Member of the Supervisory Board
